text: CLOSE Actress Kim Cattrall just slammed “ Sex and the City ” co - star Sarah Jessica Parker on Instagram. Cattrall ’ s brother recently passed away and Parker shared her support for Kim on social media, as well as telling Extra, “ We all send her our love and condolences and grant her the privacy that she's asked for. ” Although Kim did thank her fans, friends, and ` ` Sex and the City'' colleagues for their outpouring of support, she responded to Parker via Instagram saying, “ I don ’ t need your love and support at this tragic time @ SarahJessicaParker ” Wochit Kim Cattrall ( Photo : JEFF SPICER / GETTY IMAGES ) Kim Cattrall
